scripts.build: INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false react-scripts --max_old_space_size=5120 build && babel src --out-dir dist --copy-files
scripts.setup:db: sequelize db:create; node scripts/checkEmptySchema.js && node scripts/loadSchema.js; sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.start:client: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false HTTPS=true PORT=443 SSL_CRT_FILE=./.cert/client.crt SSL_KEY_FILE=./.cert/client.key react-scripts start
scripts.start:dev: yarn setup:localstack && yarn setup:db && yarn setup:elasticsearch && concurrently 'yarn start:client' 'yarn start:server:dev'
scripts.test:client: NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true REACT_APP_ENV=test react-app-rewired test src/client --logHeapUsage --env=jsdom
scripts.test:client:ci: NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true REACT_APP_ENV=test CI=true react-app-rewired test src/client --logHeapUsage --maxWorkers=2 --env=jsdom --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='src/client/**/*.{js,jsx}'
scripts.test:debug: NODE_ENV=test yarn setup:test:db && CI=true && react-app-rewired --max_old_space_size=1024 --inspect-brk=0.0.0.0 test src/server --logHeapUsage --runInBand --env=node
scripts.test:server: yarn setup:test:db test1 && yarn setup:test:db test2 && NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true react-app-rewired --max_old_space_size=2000 test src/server --logHeapUsage --maxWorkers=2 --forceExit --env=node
scripts.test:server-handlers:ci: yarn setup:test:db test1 && yarn setup:test:db test2 && NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true CI=true react-app-rewired --max_old_space_size=1500 test src/server/handlers.* --logHeapUsage --maxWorkers=2 --forceExit --env=node  --coverage  --collectCoverageFrom='src/server/handlers/**/*.{js,jsx}'
scripts.test:server-worker-non-handlers:ci: yarn setup:test:db test1 && yarn setup:test:db test2 && NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true CI=true react-app-rewired test "(?!.*handlers.*)src/(server|worker).*" --logHeapUsage --maxWorkers=2 --forceExit --env=node  --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='src/{server,worker}/!(handlers|migrations|seeders|testHelpers|migrationJobs|seeder_jobs)/**/*.{js,jsx}'
scripts.test:worker: yarn setup:test:db test1 && yarn setup:test:db test2 && NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true react-app-rewired --max_old_space_size=1500 test src/worker --logHeapUsage --maxWorkers=2 --env=node
scripts.test:pact:client: NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true REACT_APP_ENV=test react-app-rewired test src/pact/consumer --logHeapUsage --env=jsdom --testTimeout 500000 --runInBand
scripts.test:pact:client:ci: NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true REACT_APP_ENV=test CI=true react-app-rewired test src/pact/consumer --logHeapUsage --runInBand --env=jsdom --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='src/client/**/*.{js,jsx}'
scripts.test:pact:server: yarn setup:test:db test1 && yarn setup:test:db test2 && NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true react-app-rewired --max_old_space_size=2000 test src/pact/provider --logHeapUsage --forceExit --env=jsdom --testTimeout 100000 --runInBand
scripts.test:pact:server:ci: yarn setup:test:db test1 && yarn setup:test:db test2 && NEW_RELIC_ENABLED=false NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true CI=true react-app-rewired --max_old_space_size=1500 test src/pact/provider --logHeapUsage --runInBand --forceExit --env=jsdom  --coverage  --collectCoverageFrom='src/server/!(migrations|seeders|migrationJobs|seeder_jobs)/**/*.{js,jsx}' --testTimeout 100000
